creator: nain_amitnain@yahoo.com
text:
After printing the first page with full contents upto the length specifed but in the next pages it breaks page and shifted to next page even though the this page have the space for the more contents.
I am using the dynamic table creation with the conditional data.

Please suggest some solution?
Can you please supply a sample FO File (not XML or XSLT) that demonstrates the problem?
creator: bowditch_chris@hotmail.com

text: No FO testcase to reproduce the problem has been submitted in reasonable time. Closing this issue.
creator: jeremias@apache.org
